name: Forging Material Box
desc: Randomly receive 5 units of basic forging materials

name: Forging Material Box 2
desc: Randomly receive 10 units of basic forging materials

name: Forging Material Box 3
desc: Randomly receive 15 units of basic forging materials

name: Dispatch Quest - Blueprint 1
desc: Randomly receive a weapon blueprint

name: Dispatch Quest - Blueprint 2
desc: Randomly receive a weapon blueprint

name: Random Material Package III from the Union
desc: Randomly receive 30 units of basic forging materials

name: Random Material Package II from the Union
desc: Randomly receive 20 units of basic forging materials

name: Mysterious Gift
desc: A gift, but no one knows who the giver is.

name: Rawiyah's Gift
desc: A special reward from Big Sister, if you behave well.

name: Samantha's Blessing
desc: A gift from the Judge Samantha, with her most devout blessings.

name: Teadon's Gratitude
desc: Teadon appreciates everything you have done and has a gift for you.

name: Iria's Treasure
desc: Treasures unearthed by the hardworking Irians, which will be presented to the winner.

name: Auguste's Weapons
desc: Weapons used by Auguste in battle over the years.

name: Collect Luxite
desc: Send mercenaries to explore the Vltar Mine to obtain Radiant Luxite or Luxite Dust.

name: Common Facility Upgrade
desc: Receive a random Common facility upgrade. Good luck.

name: Rare Facility Upgrade
desc: Receive a random Rare facility upgrade. Good luck.

name: Epic Facility Upgrade
desc: Receive a random Epic facility upgrade. Good luck.

name: Legendary Facility Upgrade
desc: Receive a random Legendary facility upgrade. Good luck.

name: Random Common Tactical Skill
desc: Receive a random Common Tactical Skill

name: Random Rare Tactical Skill
desc: Receive a random Rare Tactical Skill

name: Random Epic Tactical Skill
desc: Receive a random Epic Tactical Skill

name: Random Legendary Tactical Skill
desc: Receive a random Legendary Tactical Skill

name: Common Tailored Training
desc: Gains a random Common tailored training. Good luck.

name: Rare Tailored Training
desc: Gains a random Rare tailored training. Good luck.

name: Epic Tailored Training
desc: Gains a random Epic tailored training. Good luck.

name: Legendary Tailored Training
desc: Gains a random Legendary tailored training. Good luck.

name: Common Gear
desc: Gains a random Common weapon or trinket. Good luck.

name: Rare Gear
desc: Gains a random Rare weapon or trinket. Good luck.

name: Mysterious Material Box
desc: It contains some basic materials. Hopefully, they are useful for you.

name: Safiyyah's Trinket
desc: It's Safiyyah's favorite trinket that she seldom shows to anyone.

name: Gloria's Trinket
desc: It's Gloria's frequently-used trinket. Now she has to give it up and hopes the new owner will treat it nicely.

name: Lutfi's Trinket
desc: It's Prince Lutfi's carry-on item, which is luxurious and majestic.

name: Alexei's Treasure
desc: It's a treasure that Alexei has been keeping for a long time. You can get it if you complete the battle.

name: Magnus's Treasure
desc: It's a treasure owned by General Magnus with absolutely good quality. You can get it if you complete a battle.

name: Xavier's Treasure
desc: Xavier's own prized treasure can be yours if you triumph in battle.

name: Legendary Weapon
desc: Gains a random Legendary weapon. Good luck.

name: Legendary Gear
desc: Gains a random Legendary weapon or trinket. Good luck.

name: Legendary Trinket
desc: Obtain a random Legendary Trinket. Good luck.

name: Nobleman's Fortune
desc: Completes a battle to take over the nobleman's fortune.

name: Nobleman's Property in the Treasury Vault
desc: Completes a battle to take over the nobleman's property in the treasury vault.

name: LilyWill's Gift
desc: Helps LilyWill complete her mission. The gift represents her heartfelt gratitude!

name: Epic Weapon
desc: You can receive a random Epic weapon. Good luck.

name: Epic Forging Blueprint
desc: You can receive a random Epic forging blueprint. Good luck.
